verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump will pick Kathy Kraninger , an Office of Management and Budget ( OMB ) official , to head the U.S. consumer watchdog] .
